mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plans (user_id, title, location, start_date, end_date, img) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{title}, #{location}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{img})
mapper.select: SELECT p.plan_id, p.title, p.location, p.start_date, p.end_date, p.img, tp.plan_place_id, tp.visit_date, tp.place_name, tp.description FROM plans p, plan_places tp where p.plan_id = tp.plan_id and p.user_id = #{user_id} AND p.plan_id = #{plan_id} ORDER BY tp.visit_date
